Package com.mhealthatlas.taxonomy.controller

Class TaxonomyQueryController

java.lang.Object
com.mhealthatlas.taxonomy.controller.TaxonomyQueryController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/taxonomies")
public class TaxonomyQueryController
extends java.lang.Object
TaxonomyQueryController is the class containing all API endpoints for quering the mHealthAtlas taxonomy.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.Integer defaultPage
    Default page is 0
    private java.lang.Integer defaultPageSize
    Default page size is Integer.MAX_VALUE; this default should be changed before going in production
    private java.lang.String defaultSortColumn
    Default sort column is id
    private java.lang.String defaultSortDir
    Default sort direction is ascending

  • Method Details

    • getAppVersions

      @GetMapping("/app-versions") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("permitAll()") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<AppVersionCollectionDto> getAppVersions​(@RequestParam(value="mode",required=true) FilterMode mode, @RequestParam(value="page",required=false) java.lang.Integer page, @RequestParam(value="size",required=false) java.lang.Integer size, @RequestParam(value="sortDir",required=false) java.lang.String sortDir, @RequestParam(value="sort",required=false) java.lang.String sort)
      Queries the taxonomy service database for application version with respect to the filter mode.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /taxonomies/app-versions

      The amount of returned applications can be restricted using the size parameter. In conjunction with the page parameter applications can be skipped. The amount of skipped applications are calculated with the formula: page * size. Additionally the matching application version can be sorted using the sort parameter to specify the sort column and the sortDir parameter to specify the sort direction.

      All mHealthAtlas users are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Parameters:
      mode - the filter mode; not null; required query parameter
      page - the starting page number of the returned android applications; default is defaultPage; optional query parameter
      size - the page size; default is defaultPageSize; optional query parameter
      sortDir - the sort direction ("ASC", "DESC"); default is defaultSortDir; optional query parameter
      sort - the sort column; default is defaultSortColumn; optional query parameter
      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the matched application versions;
      404 NOT_FOUND response, if no application version was found;
      500 INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR response, if the sort column does not exists;

    • getTaxonomy

      @GetMapping("") @ResponseStatus(OK) @PreAuthorize("permitAll()") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaxonomyDto> getTaxonomy()
      Queries the taxonomy service database to retrieve the mHealthAtlas taxonomy representation.

      The method can be invoked with an HTTP GET request calling /taxonomies

      All mHealthAtlas users are permitted to call this API endpoint.

      Returns:
      200 OK response containing the taxonomy representation;
